basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period May-June
basic.color: Flower color white or pink, fruit color green, white or red

maintenance.soil: Acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value 5.5-6.5
maintenance.sunlight: High quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
